meanings.sent1: The cat will yead her kittens soon.

meanings.sent5: The miracle of nature is when animals yead their offspring into the world.

meanings.definition: A unit of time equal to 12 months
meanings.sent1: My birthday is in the yead of January.
meanings.sent2: We celebrate New Year's Eve at the end of the yead.
meanings.sent3: The yead seemed to fly by in a blur of events and memories.
